html: <iframe width="{{ width }}" height="{{ height }}" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ params.0 }}" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="150" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://share.bramble.fm/p/{{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="150" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://{{ params.0 }}.castos.com/player/{{ params.1 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="100" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://anchor.fm/{{ params.0 }}/embed/episodes/{{ params.1 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="200" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://webplayer.whooshkaa.com/player/episode/id/{{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="200" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://playlist.megaphone.fm/?e={{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="200" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://widget.spreaker.com/player?episode_id={{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="200" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://embed.simplecast.com/{{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="180" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://share.transistor.fm/e/{{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe width="100%" height="180" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" src="https://player.captivate.fm/episode/{{ params.0 }}" seamless></iframe>
<iframe src="https://player.fireside.fm/v2/{{ params.0 }}?theme=light" width="100%" height="200" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

<iframe width="{{ width }}" height="{{ height }}" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ params.0 }}?badge=0&autopause=0&player_id=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
<iframe width="{{ width }}" height="120" src="https://bandcamp.com/EmbeddedPlayer/{{ params.0 }}" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
